source: Source: Voortrekker Baptisms Transcript. this group is not in the Voortrekker Baptisms transcript - they follow on the single page of these baptisms found in the transcript.. Repository: National Archives Repository, Pretoria., FK 2290, which is a transcript of a number of the early baptismal register now in churches in the Free State and the Transvaal.. Note: This section transcribed from the original register to continue this series of which only one page exists in the transcript. Entries 11 to 238, and then 246 unnumbered entries, in all dates 26 November 1848 and 14 January 1849 to 14 Febrary 1852 are not contained in the transcript - they have been transcribed from the original. Images of the original register can be seen at FamilySearch.org. Transcribed by Cornel Viljoen.
searchParameters: Child with smit anywhere in the surname with martha margaretha anywhere in the first name in all the registers.
